# arrow(_:)

**Type Method**

Creates a pointer accessory with an arrow shape at the specified position.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency class func arrow(_ position: UIPointerAccessory.Position) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **position**: One of the available [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPointerAccessory/Position-swift.struct] positions.

## Creating a pointer accessory

- **init(_:position:)**: Creates a pointer accessory with the specified shape and position.
